articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of Newly Developed Ultra-precision Tactical Guided Missiles
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of Newly Developed Ultra-precision Tactical Guided Missiles
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, guided the test-fire of newly developed cutting- edge ultra-precision tactical guided missiles.
					 At the central monitoring post he acquainted himself with the tactical and technological information of the newly developed guided missiles before giving an order to test-fire them.
					
					 The moment the guided missiles soared into the sky with thunderous roar.
					
					 The test-fire clearly proved that the tactical guided weapons didn't have an inch of deviation in their scientific and technological performance.
					
					 They are another shining success made by scientists in the field of national defence and workers in the field of munitions industry in their efforts to implement the WPK's policy of manufacturing high-precision, lighter, automatic and intelligent weapons and equipment.
					
					 The test-fire helped the KPA get the master key to putting all strike means including short-, medium- and long-range guided weapons on ultra-precision basis of the world level and opened a prospect for maximizing their striking accuracy and power.
					
					 The successful test-fire at a time when the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime and all other allied forces are going extremely reckless in the moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and unleash a war of aggression marked a significant event in bolstering up the defence capability for self-defense. This greatly encourages the service personnel and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed great satisfaction over the results of the test-fire.
					
					 Expressing belief that the officials and workers in the fields of national defence science and munitions industry would manufacture more ultra- precision tactical guided weapons capable of taking the decisive initiative in any operation and battle of the modern warfare through accurate preemptive strikes, always bearing in mind the expectations of the party and the people, he advanced new tasks to be fulfilled by the field of national defence science and technology.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Pyon In Son, Pak Jong Chon and Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Exposes Crimes of Presidential Chief of Staff of Chongwadae
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Exposes Crimes of Presidential Chief of Staff of Chongwadae
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released information bulletin No. 1068 on Thursday exposing the crimes of Kim Ki Chun, presidential chief of staff of Chongwadae in south Korea.
					 According to the information bulletin, Kim is the closest confidant of the "yusin" dictator who directly participated in working out the "yusin constitution" while acting as security prosecutor and anti-communist investigation department director of the Central Intelligence Agency during the Park Chung-Hee regime and a heinous fascist who took the lead in brutally cracking down on the reunification movement of people of all social standings in south Korea for democratization against fascism by faking up all kinds of spying cases including the spying case of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 After being appointed to the post of the presidential chief of staff of Chongwadae in August last year by Park Geun Hye, Kim persisted in the moves to revive the "yusin" dictatorship and escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen while styling himself a real king of Chongwadae so much as to be called "vice-president" and "Regent Taewongun Ki Chun". He held even the post of the chairman of the personal affairs committee of Chongwadae and let those who curried favor with him hold the important posts of Chongwadae and the Administration.
					
					 It is none other than Kim Ki Chun who made sure that Mun Chang Guk, a heinous pro-Japanese traitor, was designated as puppet prime minister.
					
					 Kim engineered the operation for the nomination of Mun who worked as director of the "Park Chung-Hee Memorial Foundation" when he was active as its director general, and patronized Mun to the last despite public opposition.
					
					 It is also none other than Kim who had his clans hold the posts of the chief prosecutor and the director of the Board of Audit and Inspection at the time of personnel changes last year, sparking a big furor.
					
					 Kim is a heinous anti-reunification confrontation maniac who openly called for "unification of social systems" while malignantly slandering the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and labeling the north-south cooperation undertakings as "drain on resources"
					
					 The inter-Korean relations are being driven into a serious catastrophe and the situation is being extremely aggravated because such villains as Kim are commanding all the conspiratorial rackets of the anti-reunification ultra-right conservative forces for escalating confrontation with the DPRK while having the final say on "the policy toward the north" at the important posts of Chongwadae.
					
					 If such a guy is allowed to stay in power, the south Korean people can not avoid disaster and the inter-Korean relations will go bankrupt.
					
					 Opposition parties and people from all walks of life in south Korea are strongly demanding the resignation of Kim, and media and experts on the situation are warning that if Park Geun Hye continues to take him under her wing, it will cause bigger misfortune.
					
					 Park should lend an ear to public mindset and voices and understand that it is the way of tiding over the worst crisis, a way beneficial to her.
					
					 If not, Chongwadae will face greater people's resentment and the most disgraceful ruin, the information bulletin warned.

articles.title: Agreement between DPRK and China Concluded
articles.content:
Agreement between DPRK and China Concluded
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- An agreement on the joint building, management and protection of the Wonjong- Quanhe new bridge in the DPRK-China border was concluded here between the governments of the DPRK and China on Friday.
					 The agreement was inked by Pak Myong Guk, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs from the DPRK side and Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, from the Chinese side upon the authorization of their respective governments.

articles.title: Sunchon Wharf Appears
articles.content:
Sunchon Wharf Appears 
 Sunchon, June 27 (KCNA) -- Sunchon Wharf was newly built in the DPRK. It will help ease the strain on the transport of cargo and passengers through Sunchon-Pyongyang-Nampho shipping service. 
					 A ceremony of completion took place on Friday. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were officials of the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport and its affiliated units and employees of the wharf. 
					
					 Kwak Il Ryong, vice-minister of Land and Maritime Transport, made a speech. 
					
					 The speaker called for boosting transport through the River Taedong by normalizing dredging, repairing barrages and operating boats. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony a newly-built cargo ship left the wharf.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Sinpho Pelagic Fishery Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Sinpho Pelagic Fishery Complex
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Sinpho Pelagic Fishery Complex in South Hamgyong Province.
					 He went round various fishing boats of the pelagic fleet and the angling tackles show to learn in detail about fishing conditions, districts and methods.
					
					 He encouraged fishermen, firmly determined to bring about great innovations in the pelagic fishing this year by carrying forward the heroic fighting spirit of the preceding generation.
					
					 A consultative meeting of officials in the field of fishery in the east coastal area was held on the spot.
					
					 It discussed the issue of setting a model in the east coastal area and generalizing it on the basis of the analysis of the production foundation and potentials of the fishery stations in North and South Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces.
					
					 It took measures to improve the living standard of fishermen and simultaneously push forward pelagic and offshore fishing including the issues of modernizing fishing boats, bringing dredge of wharves and repair of breakwater to a normal footing and satisfactorily ensuring electricity and spare parts needed for repairing fishing boats.
					
					 The premier called upon the fishery complex to make big fish hauls.

articles.title: Congratulations to People's Party of Cambodia
articles.content:
Congratulations to People's Party of Cambodia
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a congratulatory message to the Central Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia on Friday to mark the 63rd anniversary of its founding. 
					 The message said: 
					
					 We are rejoiced over many successes made by the People's Party of Cambodia in the work to consolidate national unity and achieve the development of the country. 
					
					 The message expressed belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties would continue to develop on good terms, wishing the party bigger successes in its work for the development of the party and the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of students of Korean high schools in Japan headed by Kim Yun Son, principal of Osaka Korea High School, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday.
					 The members of the group laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Sworn Enemy of Korean People
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Sworn Enemy of Korean People
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists are the sworn enemy of the Korean nation as they imposed immeasurable misfortune and pain upon the Korean nation by igniting the Korean War, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Korean War was the unprecedented cruel one which caused millions of casualties just in three years, which nearly amount to the number of casualties in the 100 year-long war history in the 19th century. 
					
					 The crimes of the U.S. imperialists can never be pardoned as they reduced to a sea of flames this land which was confidently advancing toward a peaceful and prosperous new society, and mercilessly killed innocent people and imposed unspeakable sufferings on the Korean nation.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are the chieftains inflicting ceaseless war disasters on the Korean people and the chief culprits disturbing the peace of the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 They, far from drawing a due lesson from the disgraceful defeat in the Korean War, have persisted in their moves to unleash a new war with the wild ambition for invading the DPRK. 
					
					 It is not a secret that the U.S. has long tried to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, contemporary barbarians and group of devils. 
					
					 The puppet south Korean group of traitors are not allowed to live within the nation as they are keen on the moves to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen and provoke a war by taking advantage of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK. 
					
					 All the striking means of the DPRK are keeping highly alert. The bases for aggression will turn into a sea of flames.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Held in South Hwanghae, North Hamgyong Provinces
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Held in South Hwanghae, North Hamgyong Provinces 
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in South Hwanghae and North Hamgyong provinces on Friday on the occasion of the day of struggle against the U.S. imperialism which falls on June 25.
					 Present there were officials of the local party, power and economic bodies and working people's organizations, people of all social strata, youth and students.
					
					 Choe Jong Ryong and Ri Sang Gwan, chairmen of the provincial people's committees, made speeches. Then followed speeches of representatives of workers, agricultural workers, youth and students.
					
					 The speakers referred to the fact that during the Fatherland Liberation War the U.S. imperialist brutes mercilessly killed Korean people with the most cruel and brutal methods and reduced peaceful cities, villages, factories, rural villages and fishing villages to ashes. 
					
					 The unpardonable crimes of the U.S. imperialists are the heinous crimes against humanity which put the atrocities committed by the Hitler fascist clique into the shade, they said, and went on:
					
					 The history and reality clearly prove that the U.S. imperialists are the chieftains of aggression and war, root cause of all misfortune and pain of the Korean nation and the sworn enemy. 
					
					 The speakers called for winning the final victory in the anti-U.S. standoff, achieving the historic cause of national reunification, dynamically pushing forward the building of a thriving socialist nation and thus accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 Then followed anti-U.S. demos.

articles.title: DPRK Woman Weightlifter Bags Gold Medals in 2014 World Junior Weightlifting Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Woman Weightlifter Bags Gold Medals in 2014 World Junior Weightlifting Championship
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifter Kim Su Jong bagged gold medals in the 2014 World Junior Weightlifting Championships which began in Kazan, Russia on June 21.
					 The championship brought together more than 260 ace men and women weightlifters of 49 countries and regions including the DPRK, Russia, China and Thailand.
					
					 Kim came first in total points in the women's 75 kg category by snatching 116 kg and lifting 134 kg in jerk.
					
					 She won two gold medals and one silver medal.
					
					 Kim Hyo Sim placed second and third in jerk and snatch events in the women's 63 kg category to come second in total points.

articles.title: DPRK Schoolgirl Yu Pyol Mi Wins Acclamation in Int'l Piano Festival
articles.content:
DPRK Schoolgirl Yu Pyol Mi Wins Acclamation in Int'l Piano Festival 
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Yu Pyol Mi, 13 year-old schoolgirl of the DPRK, won great acclamation in the Second Gradus International Piano Festival held in Denmark from June 17 to 22. 
					 Invited to the festival were famous pianists and promising young pianists of seven countries including the DPRK, Russia, Germany and Italy. 
					
					 Yu Pyol Mi performed two times on June 17 and 20. She successfully played famous songs created by world famous composers with high artistic skill to be highly acclaimed by the audience. 
					
					 Piano experts were unsparing in their praises of Yu, saying that 13-year-old young pianist jolted the stage of the festival.
					
					 Prof. Martin Jepsen, chief director of art of the piano festival, said that Yu caught the attention of the audience with her fascinating performance. Yu has high skill and rich musicality and her performance is beautiful and characteristic, the professor added. 
					
					 Assistant Prof. Valeria Resjan at the Music Academy of Finland said: I watched many times through websites Pyol Mi playing the piano and was surprised by the fact that so many accesses were made to the website to see the video and hundreds of articles on their impressions of her performance were posted. 
					
					 Prof. Vera Nosina at the Music Academy named after Gnesin of Russia expressed belief that Pyol Mi would make steady leaping progress and become world's famous pianist. 
					
					 At the end of the performance Yu Pyol Mi said that all the children in the DPRK bring their talents into full bloom under the warm care of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is putting forward children as king.

articles.title: Agitation Activities Brisk at Construction Site in DPRK
articles.content:
Agitation Activities Brisk at Construction Site in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Brisk agitation activities go on at the construction site of Wisong Scientists Street in the DPRK, which is being built under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Taking part in the activities are various art troupes and squads, including the Mansudae Art Troupe, the National Circus, the Phibada Opera Troupe and the Workers' Art Group of the C.C., General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea.
					
					 They have stirred up the builders' morale with their fresh and cheerful art performances.
					
					 Announcers of the Central Broadcasting Committee of Korea, too, joined in the agitation activities.
					
					 The Capital City Construction Commission, the High-Speed Youth Shock Brigade Guidance Bureau and other construction units conducted visual agitation in a peculiar way to inspire the builders to work miracles and feats in the construction of the street.
					
					 Movie persons are performing their art activities to encourage the builders.

articles.title: Various Kinds of Tea Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
Various Kinds of Tea Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Jangsu Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Factory in the DPRK has mass-produced various kinds of tea popular among citizens in recent years.
					 They include ginkgo leaf tea, barrenwort tea and gylmyong (semen cassiae) tea, which are very good for health and longevity.
					
					 The tea based on ginkgo leaf extract has a good effect on blood trouble and barrenwort tea is specially efficacious for aging. Gylmyong tea helps prevent constipation and recover eyesight.
					
					 There are also teas made of Crataegus pinnatifida, Eleutherococcus senticosus and other medicinal materials efficacious for diseases.
					
					 The factory recently won a high appreciation from the government for its signal contribution to the improvement of the people's livelihood.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Brand U.S. Imperialists as Root Cause of Misfortune
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Brand U.S. Imperialists as Root Cause of Misfortune 
 Tokyo, June 25 (KNS-KCNA) -- Chairpersons of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) made public statements on June 25, 64 years since the U.S. imperialists ignited the Korean War. 
					 Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the U.S. imperialists ignited the war for aggression by mobilizing huge armed forces and south Korean puppet army and even forces of 15 satellite countries 64 years ago with the sinister intention to stifle the DPRK and realize the wild ambition for world domination. 
					
					 Ri Yong Hun, chairman of the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said that in order to make the Korean peninsula their permanent colony, the U.S. imperialists are resorting to the moves to cook up the triangular military alliance with south Korea and Japan and staging largest-ever nuclear war drills to threaten peace and security of the peninsula. 
					
					 Mun Kwang Hui, chairperson of the Aichi Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, accused the U.S. imperialists of persistently blocking the reunification of Korea, the greatest desire of the Korean people.  The puppet clique of Park Geun Hye, the servant for the U.S., is begging for the permanent presence of the U.S. forces in south Korea while talking about "provocations of the north" and, at the same time, unhesitatingly committing traitorous acts of driving the situation on the Korean peninsula into an extreme phase of tension in league with the U.S. master, Mun added. 
					
					 Kim Hak Bok, chairperson of the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said that it is impossible to achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the country as long as the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet authorities, root cause of all misfortune of the Korean nation and chieftains of the moves to ignite a war, are left intact. 
					
					 Ri Ju Hak, chairman of the Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, urged the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the Korean people, to withdraw their aggression troops from south Korea at once, bearing in mind the lesson from the defeat in the Korean War and spy ship Pueblo which was captured by the DPRK. 
					
					 Ri expressed the will to actively join in the nationwide struggle for the independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: U.S., South Korean Authorities Accused of Employing Same Method as Done in Korean War
articles.content:
U.S., South Korean Authorities Accused of Employing Same Method as Done in Korean War
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Choson Sinbo, the organ of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of the Korean Residents in Japan, on June 25 carried an article lashing out at Obama and Park Geun Hye for employing the same war method as done in the 1950s and laying bare their unchanged nature as peace-disturbers.
					 The article said:
					
					 The Korean War ignited by the U.S. in the 1950s was a war of aggression according to its carefully worked-out scenario to dominate the whole Korean peninsula. 
					
					 Now the Obama Administration is employing the same method as done in the 1950s.
					
					 The U.S. deceived the international public opinion in the 1950s to label the DPRK "provoker". It is a miscalculation that it thinks the method is workable now.
					
					 It has purposely created the danger of war but met self-contradiction.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime is hurling a stumbling block in the way of achieving peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula by kowtowing to the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK is carrying forward the history of victory in the war and the moves of those who were defeated in the war will meet a fiasco.

articles.title: S. Korean People Dismiss Results of Review of Kono Statement
articles.content:
S. Korean People Dismiss Results of Review of Kono Statement
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- People of different social standings in south Korea are condemning the Japanese authorities for their despicable moves to twist the essence of the Kono statement in which he partially admitted the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on June 20 in an editorial clarified that the Japanese authorities made public the results of the review of the statement which said there was adjustment of wordings with the south Korean authorities when the Japanese government was working out the statement in 1993.
					
					 Lurking behind this was its intention to downplay the meaning of the statement by hinting that it was a product of the diplomatic negotiations, the newspaper said, and went on:
					
					 The gravity of the review of the statement is that it was part of the Japanese moves to distort the history.
					
					 The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on June 21 said in an editorial that the announcement of the results of the review was a third-rate act of denying the statement itself.
					
					 The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society on June 23 released a statement denouncing the Japanese authorities' announcement of the results of the review of the statement.

articles.title: U.S. War Moves under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. War Moves under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, issued a statement calling for shattering the moves of the U.S. imperialists for a nuclear war and driving U.S. forces out of south Korea.
					 Disasters and pain the Korean people suffered due to the Korean war for aggression ignited by the U.S. imperialists can neither be forgotten nor written off no matter how much water flows under the bridge and no matter how frequently a generation is replaced by a new generation, it said.
					
					 All the crimes committed by the U.S. imperialists in the three-year Korean war fully revealed that they are the chieftain of aggression and war and the sworn enemy of the Korean people, the statement said.
					
					 They, far from drawing a lesson from their heavy defeat in the Korean war, have persisted in the moves for a war for more than six decades since the ceasefire, it noted, and went on:
					
					  This being a hard reality, the U.S. is floating groundless lies that "the north first attacked south Korea to achieve reunification by  communizing it" and "the north's nukes are becoming the most dangerous means threatening the world" just like the guilty party filing the suit first, bringing the danger of a nuclear war to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 All Koreans should turn out to resolutely shatter the U.S. moves for a war and have the long pent-up grudge settled.
					
					 The U.S. forces should pull out of south Korea unconditionally, taking with them all their war means.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slams Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slams Park Geun Hye 
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on June 25 in an editorial rapped Park Geun Hye for being utterly indifferent to the people. 
					 The editorial said that Park Geun Hye has not made any apology for her wrong designation of Mun Chang Guk as a candidate for "prime minister" though Mun resigned himself. 
					
					 In less than 18 months three candidates for "prime minister" resigned, the editorial said, adding:
					
					 The final responsibility for the failed personnel affairs rests with the "president" who has the right to handle personnel affairs. Such setbacks cannot but repeat themselves unless Park changes her viewpoint.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Self-Righteous Behavior Denounced
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Self-Righteous Behavior Denounced
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Personages and about 150 elders of different social standings of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Thursday to denounce the self-righteous behavior of the puppet chief executive of south Korea. 
					 Speakers at the press conference found faults with Mun Chang Guk and other candidates for power positions.
					
					 They recalled that Park Geun Hye appointed those who are subservient to power and embellish pro-Japanese acts and dictatorship to the posts of chief of public information in Chongwadae and the chairman of the committee for examining Broadcasting and News Agency and Park's unreasonable personnel appointment has gone beyond the tolerance limit. 
					
					 It is the manifestation of all retrogressive actions of the "government" that it declared not guilty the chief culprit who obstructed the investigation into the case of the Intelligence Service's interference in the elections and outlawed the Teachers Union, they said, and went on:
					
					 If Park persists in her self-righteous behavior going against the mindset of the people, she will never escape from catastrophe.
					
					 The people will no longer trust "the government" but offer resistance in order to solve the problems by themselves. 
					
					 The personages and elders staged a demonstration as far as the "government" building.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Flailed for Suppressing Teachers Union
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Flailed for Suppressing Teachers Union
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Central Committee of the Educational and Cultural Workers' Union of Korea issued a statement Friday denouncing the south Korean authorities for cracking down on the Teachers Union.
					 The statement recalled that recently the puppet Seoul Administrative Court made a decision that the Teachers Union is an outlawed trade union and deprived it of its legitimate status.
					
					 This was an action of strangling the inviolable democratic platform and a heinous undemocratic act to stamp out progressive and democratic forces and revive the "yusin" dictatorship, it said, and went on:
					
					 The Teachers Union was formed in 1989, gained the status of the legitimate trade union in 1999 through the undaunted struggle against the brutal fascist suppression by the puppet group. It is a progressive educational organization which has taken the lead in the struggle for the education movement and independence, democracy and reunification in south Korea for the past 15 years.
					
					 To defend the Teachers Union in south Korea is a serious and crucial issue to win social democracy.
					
					 The people from all walks of life in south Korea should turn out as one in the just struggle to protect the Teachers Union from the undemocratic violence by the fascists to trample down the inviolable platform and deprive it of the right to genuine education.
					
					 We will as ever positively support the Teachers Union in its activities for social democracy, peace and independent reunification against outsiders and for genuine education.

articles.title: Secret Power Body behind S. Korean Chief Executive
articles.content:
Secret Power Body behind S. Korean Chief Executive 
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on June 26 in an editorial disclosed the true colors of the secret organization exercising real power behind the south Korean chief executive.
					 South Korean people considered the "Seven-men Society" including Kim Ki Chun, presidential chief of staff of Chongwadae, as a secret organization exercising real power behind the chief executive after Park Geun Hye took office.
					
					 But Pak Kwan Yong, former speaker of the puppet National Assembly, asserted at the press conference on June 25 that there were guys putting their heads together with the "president" in private except the "society".
					
					 On the same day a lawmaker talked about the secret organization called "Manmanhoe," adding that it includes Park Ji Man, brother of Park Geun Hye, Ri Jae Man, chief secretary of the Government Administration of Chongwadae, and Jong Yun Hoe who was an assistant to Park Chung-Hee and  all of them are exercising real power.
					
					 The editorial said that the peoples' suspicion about unknown power began to become clear and the rumor that there is a power struggle between Kim Ki Chun and the above-said organization floating in the political camp in private was opened to public at last.
					
					 The true colors of such secret organization are bound to be revealed through the secret strife within heavyweights in power, it said and went on:
					
					 Signs of an impending downfall of power have already been brought to light though the present chief executive has some years before the end of the tenure of her office.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Iran
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Iran
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- An Iranian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Tehran on June 21.
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 It decided to arrange political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of the President on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Meetings to remember President Kim Il Sung took place in Romania and Kyrgyzstan, a lecture meeting and film shows in Nigeria between June 12 and 14 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					 Films shown included Korean films "Tower of the Juche Idea" and "Arch of Triumph".
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association said that Kim Il Sung was a genuine leader of the people and the benevolent father who founded the man-centered Juche idea for the first time in the history of human thought and solved all issues arising in the revolution and construction in the interests of the masses on the basis of it.
					
					 The noble exploits the President performed by creating an epoch-making miracle of defeating the U.S. and Japanese imperialists with his outstanding military war method and stratagem will be cherished in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also progressive mankind, he stressed.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party said that Kim Il Sung devoted his all to the happiness of the people all his life.
					
					 The acting chairman of the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies said that the President made undying contributions to the cause of global independence, adding: The banner of independence which he held aloft has become a great motive force greatly encouraging the Korean people and progressive mankind today.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Bangladeshi Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Bangladeshi Figures
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi figures issued statements on June 17 and 18 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, said that Kim Il Sung is the great sun who embarked on the road of the revolutionary struggle in his early years, created the immortal Juche idea and wisely led the Korean revolution, the world socialist movement and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The President is alive in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressive peoples for his great exploits and noble traits, he added.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was an invincible and iron-willed commander who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists and a peerless great man who devoted his all to the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, the development of the socialist movement and the victorious advance of the human cause of independence.
					
					 The exploits Kim Il Sung performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence will shine forever.
					
					 We are firmly sure that the Korean people will register a greater success in the struggle for national reunification and the building of a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Indian Papers Laud Kim Jong Il's Feats
articles.content:
Indian Papers Laud Kim Jong Il's Feats
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Indian papers carried articles illustrated with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il to mark the 50th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The Indian paper New Delhi Times on June 17 said in an article that the Korean people call the WPK the mother party.
					
					 The people's deep trust in the party would be unthinkable without the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the article added.
					
					 The Indian paper Krishna Aberta on June 19 said in an article titled "Kim Jong Il, undying party-building feats":
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into a powerful political force leading the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 It was thanks to him that the service personnel and people of the DPRK were trained to be those with strong mental power who bring about epoch-making changes and miracles in accomplishing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Feats he performed in the party-building will always shine along with socialist Korea winning victory after victory.
					
					 The Indian paper Passion India on June 16 lauded him for developing the WPK into the eternal party of President Kim Il Sung and an invincible party serving the masses and enjoying their absolute support and trust.

articles.title: Kimjongilia and Korean Photo, Book and Handicrafts Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Kimjongilia and Korean Photo, Book and Handicrafts Exhibition Opens in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- An opening ceremony of Kimjongilia and Korean photo, book and handicrafts exhibition took place at the Ussuriysk City Museum of Maritime Territory, Russia on June 18 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed on the front wall of the venue of the exhibition were portraits of smiling Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. Also displayed there were more than 100 potted Kimjongilias.
					
					 On display there were photos dealing with exploits Kim Jong Il performed in building and leading the party.
					
					 Also exhibited there were works of the Generalissimos and supreme leader Kim Jong Un, publications introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					  Present at the opening ceremony were figures of all social strata and masses of Russia.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK consul general in Nakhodka and staff members of the consulate general.
					
					  The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits of the smiling Generalissimos and paid tribute to them.
					
					 A deputy mayor of the city said that Kim Jong Il was a great revolutionary and politician who made undying contributions to the development of the Korean revolution and the WPK, and conducted energetic activities to steadily develop the traditional Russia-DPRK friendship.
					
					 The deputy mayor expressed the will to make positive efforts to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK.
					
					 The director of the museum said:
					
					 It is a pride and honor of our museum to open the significant exhibition.
					
					 Kimjongilias blooming in the far eastern land associated with the footsteps left by Kim Jong Il reflect the ardent reverence of the Russian people for him who made a great contribution to the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 The exhibition will positively make contributions to the development of the relations between the two peoples.
					
					 The exhibition will last until the end of June.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Observed by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Observed by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Russian paper Nakhodkinski Rabochi on June 17 carried an article titled "Integral whole of party and army" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il. The article introduced the feats he performed by leading the WPK.
					
					 The Egyptian paper Al-Misaiya said on June 18 in an article titled "Kim Jong Il, master of independent politics" that the august name of Kim Jong Il who always led the Korean people's cause of independence and the cause of global independence to victory will eternally shine in the history of world politics as the one of the master of independent politics.
					
					 The Algerian paper Al-Misaa on June 16 praised him for working heart and soul for the development of the country's musical art till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The Bulgarian paper Novo Rabotnichesko Delo in an article titled "Practicality of Juche idea" introduced in detail the advantages of Korean-style socialism centred on the popular masses to which the Juche idea is applied.

articles.title: British Organization Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Smear Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
British Organization Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Smear Campaign against DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Britain-Korea Friendship Association made public a statement on June 10 in denunciation of the south Korean authorities' human rights racket against the DPRK.
					 It is, indeed, ridiculous that the authorities are going to set up a UN "office for human rights in the north" in south Korea although it is the worst tundra of human rights in the world, the statement said.
					
					 Terming the establishment of the "office" an insult to justice, the statement noted:
					
					 The UN should make an inquiry into the human rights performance in south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces and their U.S. master are trying to abuse the UN for their smear campaign and psychological warfare against the DPRK out of their sinister design to undermine its socialist system centred on the popular masses.
					
					 We demand the south Korean puppet forces stop at once the moves to set up the "office."
					
					 We called on the world progressive people to make positive efforts to foil the reactionary anti-DPRK human rights offensive of the imperialists.

articles.title: Organization of DR Congo Supports June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Organization of DR Congo Supports June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Working Citizens' Association of the DR Congo released a statement on June 15, the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We support the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and call on peace-loving countries to positively conduct the movement to put an end to the moves of outside forces. The outside forces have gone desperate in their moves to prevent the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad from getting reconciled to achieve reunification in line with the north-south joint declaration published on June 15, 2000.
					
					 The policy of good faith pursued by Marshal Kim Jong Un toward the compatriots in the south is arousing worldwide sympathy and being hailed by all peoples aspiring after world peace, unity and a fresh order for progress.
					
					 The Korean people have made strenuous efforts to realize the reunification of the country in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 It is an obligation of all peace-loving people to prevent a thermonuclear war which will bring an untold disaster to humankind.
					
					 The U.S. should immediately pull its forces out of south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work off Press in Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work off Press in Myanmar
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in booklet by the Aye Offset Publishing House of Myanmar with due ceremony on June 19.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the WPK is a principled requirement for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Korean revolution.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige lanzamiento de prueba de proyectiles teledirigidos tacticos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige lanzamiento de prueba de proyectiles teledirigidos tacticos 
						
 Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el lanzamiento de prueba de proyectiles teledirigidos tacticos de alta precision, nuevamente desarrollados en nivel de punta.
					 En el puesto central de observacion, el Mariscal dio la orden del lanzamiento de prueba tras reconocer los datos tacticos y tecnicos de los proyectiles.
					
					 A traves del presente lanzamiento de prueba quedo comprobada perfectamente sin la menor deficiencia la capacidad cientifica y tecnica de los proyectiles.
					
					 Estas armas superfinas devienen otro exito orgulloso alcanzado por los investigadores de la rama de defensa nacional y los obreros de la rama de industria belica en materializar la linea del partido de aplicar en los armamentos la alta precision, aligeramiento, automatizacion e inteligencia.
					
					 A traves de esta ocasion, el EPC llego a  poseer la llave clave capaz de aplicar en los proyectiles teledirigidos de medio y largo alcance y otros medios de golpe la alta precision de talla mundial y a tener la cierta perspectiva  que permite mejorar al maximo la efectividad y el poderio de golpe de armas.
					
					 El lanzamiento de prueba realizado con exito cuando han llegado a la  extremidad las maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento y de provocacion de guerra de agresion de Estados Unidos, la banda de traidores titeres del Sur de Corea y otras fuerzas seguidoras contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, constituye una gran victoria eventual lograda en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas autodefensivas, lo cual redoblo la conviccion y  el coraje del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					 El Mariscal se mostro muy satisfecho de los resultados del lanzamiento de prueba.
					
					 Expreso la conviccion de que sin olvidar la esperanza del partido y el pueblo, los funcionarios y obreros de la rama de la ciencia de defensa nacional y la rama de industria belica, fabriquen muchas armas con alta precision capaces de tomar la iniciativa en cualesquier operaciones y combates de la guerra moderna con el certero golpe preventivo y les presento las nuevas tareas cientificas y tecnicas que se presentan en la rama de defensa nacional.
					
					 Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Pyon In Son, Pak Jong Chon y Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Comandancia de Frente Sudoeste de EPC publica informacion importante
articles.content:
Comandancia de Frente Sudoeste de EPC publica informacion  importante
 Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- La Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 26 una informacion importante que senala como sigue:
					 El dia 26, los belicistas de la capa militar titere del Sur de Corea cometieron sin aviso previo graves provocaciones militares lanzando proyectiles en el mar alrededor de la isla Yonphyong hacia las aguas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 Estas provocaciones militares imprudentes son la manifestacion abierta de la intriga de agresion a la RPDC, destinada a encender la mecha de guerra con los fuegos intencionales contra las sagradas aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC.
					
					 Lo demuestra claramente el ultimo desarrollo de la situacion en las aguas candentes del Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					 Con el paso del tiempo, se amplia de manera escalonada la intrusion de los buques de guerra del ejercito surcoreano en las aguas de la RPDC bajo el pretexto de control de los barcos pesqueros y se realiza dia y noche el lanzamiento de proyectiles en las islas Paekryong, Yonphyong, Taechong y otras.
					
					 Frente a la situacion creada, todos los cuerpos de golpe adscritos al Frente Sudoeste del EPC ya estan totalmente listos para el estado de golpe de represalia demoledor.
					
					 Sabemos que el imprudente fuego de los belicistas de la capa militar titere que se desarrolla en las aguas mas candentes esta relacionado con el control trasero del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional y Chongwadae.
					
					 Park Geun-hye y su banda estan sumergidos  en la crisis irreparable en la administracion estatal. Para liberarse de este apuro, ellos intentan buscar la ultima salida con llevar la situacion a la peor fase al encender la mecha en las dichas aguas candentes.
					
					 Todos los oficiales y los soldados del Frente Sudoeste estan dispuestos a castigar a los provocadores al reventar la indignacion arraigada.
					
					 Lo que solo nos queda es la orden de golpe de la Comandancia Suprema.
					
					 Los provocadores lamentaran mucho de sus imprudentes provocaciones de guerra.

articles.title: CRPP revela crimenes de alto funcionario de Chongwadae
articles.content:
CRPP revela crimenes de alto funcionario de Chongwadae
 Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 26 la informacion no.1068 para revelar y denunciar los crimenes de Kim Ki Chun, 
					 jefe del gabinete de los secretarios de Chongwadae (Casa Azul) del Sur de Corea.
					
					 Segun la nota, Kim Ki Chun era brazo derecho del dictador de "Yusin (renovacion)" Park Chung Hee y en el regimen de este, estuvo directamente involucrado en la fabricacion de la "Constitucion de Yusin" fungiendo los 
					
					 cargos de procurador de seguridad publica y director de investigacion anticomunista de la Agencia Central de Inteligencia.
					
					 Ese fascista de pesima calana reprimio cruelmente la lucha de los habitantes surcoreanos por la democratizacion antifascista y la reunificacion inventando los incidentes de las redes de espias, inclusive el de coreano espia residente en Japon.
					
					 Despues que asumiera el actual cargo en agosto del ano pasado en el poder de Park Geun-hye, Kim se porta como monarca verdadero de Chongwadae ganandose apodos "vicepresidente" y "regente de Taewongun Ki Chun" y 
					
					 persiguio tenazmente el renacimiento de la dictadura de "Yusin" y la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					 Tomando hasta el cargo de presidente del Comite del Personal de Chongwadae, ubico a sus hombres en los puestos importantes de Chongwadae y la Administracion.
					
					 El esta tambien detras de la nominacion del connotado traidor projapones Mun Chang Guk como candidato al premier.
					
					 Cuando Kim era director general de la "Fundacion Memorial de Park Chung Hee", Mun trabajaba como director de la misma entidad.
					
					 A pesar del fuerte rechazo a esa nominacion, Kim defendio hasta el final a Mun.
					
					 En el ano pasado, designo a sus colaboradores cuando se sustituian el procurador general y el presidente del Tribunal de Cuentas, hecho que produjo gran escandalo.
					
					 El elemento conflictivo anti-reunificacion calumnio la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre e insistio abiertamente en la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" calificando la cooperacion entre ambas partes coreanas de "entrega desmesurada de dinero" al Norte de Corea.
					
					 Hoy dia, las relaciones N-S se encuentran en la fase catastrofica y la situacion se agrava al extremo porque ese canalla controla a sus caprichos la "politica sobre el Norte" y dirige generalmente la campana de intrigas y enfrentamiento con la RPDC que lanza las fuerzas ultraderechistas y conservadoras anti-reunificacion.
					
					 Si lo perdona, la poblacion surcoreana no puede salir de la crisis de hoy ni evitar la ruptura de las relaciones N-S.
					
					 Los partidos opositores y los surcoreanos de diferentes sectores demandan fuertemente la renuncia de Kim y los medios de prensa y los especialistas en la situacion advierten a Park Geun-hye que puede sufrir desgracias mas grandes si sigue amparando a Kim.
					
					 Park debe escuchar las voces de sus habitantes y la opinion publica al tener presente que asi puede salir de la peor crisis y salvarse.
					
					 En el caso contrario, la indignacion del pueblo explotara contra Chongwadae y por consiguiente, ella sufrira el arruinamiento mas vergonzoso.

articles.title: CC de la USECC condena represion contra SNE
articles.content:
CC de la USECC condena represion contra SNE
 Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Central de la Union Sindical de Educacion y Cultura de Corea publico el dia 27 una declaracion que condena la represion de autoridades surcoreanas contra el Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes (SNE).
					  Recientemente, el Tribunal Administrativo de Seul invalido la posicion legal del SNE al tomar la decision de calificarlo de extralegal, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Esa locura antidemocratica tiene por su objetivo eliminar la educacion democratica, exterminar las fuerzas democraticas progresistas y resucitar la dictadura de Yusin (renovacion).
					
					  El SNE es la entidad docente progresista que obtuvo estatus legal en 1999 a los 10 anos desde su fundacion en 1989 mediante la lucha indoblegable frente a la campana de represion fascista de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas.
					
					 Durante 15 anos desde entonces, estuvo al frente de la educacion y la lucha por la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion.
					
					  Hoy en dia, la defensa o no del SNE en el Sur de Corea es una cuestion muy seria vinculada con la democratizacion o no de la sociedad.
					
					  Distintos sectores del Sur de Corea deben levantarse unanimemente en la lucha justa por defender el SNE contra la represion antidemocratica de los fascistas, encaminada a privar el derecho a la educacion verdadera.
					
					  En el futuro tambien, apoyaremos las actividades del SNE para lograr la educacion autentica aspirando a la democratizacion de la sociedad, la paz y la reunificacion independiente y luchando contra las fuerzas extranjeras.

articles.title: Rubricado convenio Corea-China sobre construccion de nuevo puente
articles.content:
Rubricado convenio Corea-China sobre construccion de nuevo puente
 Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- Quedo firmado el dia 27 en esta capital el convenio sobre la construccion, administracion y proteccion conjuntas del nuevo puente fronterizo Wonjong-Quanhe entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Republica Popular China.
					 Lo suscribieron el vicecanciller coreano Pak Myong Guk y el embajador chino acreditado en la RPDC, Liu Hongcai, por encargo de sus respectivos gobiernos.
